content: Career Lifestyle Investments Asked by Isaac ChanAsked on 26 Feb 2019What is your favourite principle from Ray Dalio's "Principles"?1 answerAnswerBump1
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Isaac Chan, Business  at NUSLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 26 Feb 2019Personally, my favourite is on being a realist!To me, this would mean seeing reality as it is, and not how I want it to be, which also includes how I see myself as well. I try to see myself along with all my strengths and weaknesses, and to take on challenges that are suited for myself, and to push me out of my comfort zone. I also try to see reality as objectively as possible, so I avoid the problem of underthinking or overthinking, and to see what I can get out of reality the most!0 comments0
